metadata.name: ME AS A WOMAN #1
metadata.description:
Me as a woman or woman's appearance ..! 


“This photo was taken during the 'acid attack against girls & women' in several cities of IRAN in 2014, actually these self portraits are about my search for challenging the identity issues as a woman in Iran, now after 8 years in 2022 you can read this image in a different way that has been associated with the ideas of freedom ..”
